items.sentence: Do you realize what you\'re asking me to do?
You should\'ve told Tom that you were sorry.
You shouldn\'t always believe what Tom says.
I\'m going to try to talk to Tom about this.
Tom told the police everything that he knew.
I thought that you said you weren\'t afraid.
I thought you said that you weren\'t afraid.
Do you think that Tom was telling the truth?
Do you think that Tom will allow me do that?
Wouldn\'t it be nice if Tom did that for us?
I really wanted to go to Australia with Tom.
I remember that Tom was wearing a brown hat.
I share my office with two other colleagues.
Why did you spend so much time in Australia?
Why do you keep forgetting to lock the door?
You\'ll tell Tom how to do that, won\'t you?
You\'re a better skier than me, aren\'t you?
I assumed you and Tom were planning to come.
I wish we could go to your concert tomorrow.
I wish you all the very best for the future.
